===Sets shieldbug/beta shieldbug color and scale.===

= Description =

<!--
Sets the color of shieldbugs.

|| *Revision Added* || *Default* || *[CvarFlags Flags]* || *[ParamType Parameter Type]* ||
|| r371 || `255 255 255` || [FCVAR_NONE] || [Color255] ||
-->

Sets shieldbugs with 3 different colors and percentage of the shieldbugs you want to give these colors. Also Sets scale of the shieldbugs and percentage of the shieldbugs you want to give a custom scale.

==Sets the color of shieldbugs.== 
======asw_shieldbug_color====== 
{|
|| Revision Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| r371 || `255 255 255` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Color255] 
|}

==Sets a second color for shieldbugs.==
======asw_shieldbug_color2======
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 2.0 || `255 255 255` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Color255] 
|}
======asw_shieldbug_color2_percent======
Sets the percentage of the shieldbugs want to give the second color, sets the value in between 0 - 1. 
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 2.0 || `0` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Float] 
|}
